articles.description: A partial solar eclipse on Saturday will make it look as if the moon has taken a bite out of the sun over parts of North America, Greenland and Northern Euro...
articles.content:
A partial solar eclipse is seen as the sun rises behind the Delaware Breakwater Lighthouse on June 10, 2021, at Lewes Beach in Delaware. - Aubrey Gemignani/NASA
